title: The Sticker Strategy
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>I did it! The step went well, Karin-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, I saw it clearly, Ayumu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, it’s because you patiently taught me, Karin-san. Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, you worked hard, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Since I was able to do a new step, let’s put a sticker here.... This is for today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, you put a sticker down for each time you master a step? That’s a cute little thing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>This is called the sticker strategy. It might seem childish, but it gets me motivated, so.... Look, today is this panda sticker!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Panda.... What an adorable sticker. So this kind of thing exists.... Heeee.... It’s really cute....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ah, I’ll give this one to you if you’d like! I bought 2 sheets by mistake. By all means, please use this sticker too, Karin-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>....That’s right, maybe I’ll do the sticker strategy too. I got this one after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
